confirmationEmail: You will receive a confirmation email with all the details about your new order.
heroTitle: Custom Truck Campers Built for Real Adventure
heroIntro: We design and build lightweight, purpose-built campers tailored to your truck, your dimensions, and how you actually travel
heroCTA: Get Your Custom Build Proposal, Now!
heroNote: No Obligation • Built In Sweden • Designed For Nordic Conditions
valueTitle: Designed Around You, Not a Template
valueItem1: Exact fit for your truck and chassi
valueItem3: Materials well chosen for harsh Scandinavian climates to hot sunny weather
howItWorksStep1Text: Vehicle, dimensions, and how you plan to use your camper
howItWorksStep3Text: Tailored to your needs and budget
formSectionIntro: Share your vehicle details and desired dimensions. This is a free, no-commitment request, perfect if you’re still exploring ideas
customizeText: Fill in all your requested measures below, if you have any questions or concerns, give us a call
customizeTextSecond: To be able to send a request you must first register as a customer
onlyCustomersCanCustomize: Only registered customers can customize a build
galleryIntro: Find inspiration from other’s projects and builds
galleryTitle1: Removing the bed to save weight
galleryDescription1: Removing the bed that weights approx. 200kg to gain more weight for the camper build.
galleryDescription2: For easier access to the camper a foldable ladder will be installed.
galleryDescription3: Following alumium extrusions will be the foundation for the camper build.
galleryDescription4: Milling groovs that will be attached with wood glue.
galleryDescription5: In this project we are using lightweight plywood called Albasia, that weights 40-50% less than standard plywood.
galleryDescription6: dry fitting camper is important to makesure it has the correct fit and dimensions
galleryDescription7: All wooden pieces glued together and now ready for final coat
galleryDescription8: Just dried from last stroke with roller, time and energy consuming work
galleryDescription9: Next step is to glue all wooden modules togheter with the camper shell
galleryDescription10: Drilled precise holes and bolted it all togetherto the car frame, here its important to use 10 grade steel bolts and nuts
aboutIntro: FlakBygg was founded with a simple goal: to build well-engineered, functional, and durable solutions without unnecessary costs. We believe that high-quality craftsmanship should be accessible, not overpriced.
passion-DrivenCraftsmanshipText: FlakBygg is built on genuine passion for design, engineering, and problem-solving. Every project starts with curiosity and care not revenue targets. We take pride in understanding how things work, how they can be improved, and how to build them properly from the ground up.
passion-DrivenCraftsmanshipTextSecond: Because our work is driven by passion rather than volume production, we are able to:
passion-DrivenCraftsmanshipItem1: Focus on the details that truly matter
passion-DrivenCraftsmanshipItem2: Optimize structures for strength, weight, and longevity
fairPricingNoCompromisesText: Our pricing reflects the actual work, materials, and engineering involved nothing more, nothing less. By avoiding unnecessary markups, middlemen, and branding costs, we are able to offer high-end custom builds at highly competitive prices compared to similar products on the market.
fairPricingNoCompromisesTextSecond: We value transparency and make sure you always understand what you are paying for and why.
builtForRealUseText: FlakBygg products are designed to be used, not just displayed. Whether your goal is full-time travel, weekend adventures, or work-focused solutions, our builds are created to handle real-world conditions.
differentWayofBuildingText: FlakBygg is not about mass production or maximizing output. It is about building things properly, with intention and respect for both the craft and the customer.
differentWayofBuildingTextSecond: If you are looking for a partner who values quality, honesty, and smart engineering as much as you do, FlakBygg is here to build something that truly fits your needs.
noRequestsYet: You haven’t made any requests yet! Start your journey towards your dream vehicle now!
preferencesPlaceholder: E.g car model, Wall Thickness, color preferces....
name: Name
confirmDeleteCustomer: Are you sure you want to delete this customer?
wrongEmail: Please enter a valid email address
wrongPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters, include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
orderProcessIntro: At FlakBygg, every build is custom-made to match your vehicle, your lifestyle, and your adventures. Our order process is designed to be straightforward and transparent, ensuring you feel confident and informed every step of the way.
initialInquirytext: The process starts when you contact us through our website. You provide basic information about your vehicle, your intended use, and any ideas or requirements you already have. This helps us understand the scope of your project from the beginning.
consultationAndNeedsAssessmenttext: After reviewing your inquiry, we will contact you through our chat system to go through your requirements in detail.
weDiscusstext1: Vehicle specifications, model year, and construction
weDiscusstext2: Intended use (full-time travel, weekend trips, work, etc.)
weDiscusstext4: Weight considerations and technical constraints to ensure the design is realistic, safe, and optimized for your vehicle
designConsultationtext: Based on the consultation, we develop a technical concept and an overall design tailored to your requirements.
proposal: You will receive a clear proposal that includes:
proposalItem4: Fixed price or a detailed cost breakdown
proposalAdjustments: Adjustments can be made at this stage to ensure everything meets your expectations.
quotationAndAgreementtext: Once the design is finalized, we provide a formal quotation. Upon your approval, we draft a contract outlining the scope of work, timelines, payment terms, and other essential details to ensure clarity and mutual understanding.
buildProcesstext: Your build is carried out according to the agreed design and specifications. We focus on structural integrity, weight optimization, and long-term durability.
buildProcesstextsecond: Depending on the project, progress updates or documentation may be provided during this phase.
deliveryAndHandovertext: Once the build is complete, we arrange delivery or pickup. With the delivery, you will receive detailed assembly instructions. These instructions must be carefully reviewed and followed precisely to ensure correct installation and to maintain the guaranteed standard of the product.
deliveryAndHandovertextSecond: Currently, we offer pickup from central Sweden or delivery within Stockholm. If you require delivery elsewhere, please contact us and we will evaluate the available options.
afterSalesSupporttext: Our commitment to you doesn’t end with the handover. We provide after-sales support to address any questions or issues that may arise after you’ve started using your camper build. Whether it’s maintenance advice, warranty support, or assistance with future modifications, we’re here to help ensure your camper continues to meet your needs and expectations.
